title: Src. of authority of head of state in China, Iran

content.question:
There are similarities and differences in the sources of authority for leaders in China and Iran. 
(a) Describe two formal powers of Iran’s supreme leader. 
(b) Identify two official positions that China’s head of state typically holds today. 
(c) Describe one similarity in the sources of authority of Iran’s supreme leader and of China’s head of state. 
(d) Describe one difference in the sources of authority of Iran’s supreme leader and of China’s head of state.
